item.title: Trean Insurance Group, Inc. 10-K
item.description: Trean Insurance Group, Inc., which is in the Fire, Marine & Casualty Insurance [6331] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 26 2021 had 41382 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: insurance - 487 instances company - 482 instances 2020 - 374 instances december - 323 instances 31 - 321 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
